name: private-repo-published-publicly
description: Find code repos marked as private but published as public packages/modules.

queries.name: query0
queries.query: find CodeRepo with public!=true and classification!='public' that published CodeModule with public=true

name: aws-ecs-tasks-orphaned
description: Finds ECS tasks that are running but its corresponding task definition is gone. These tasks are orphaned and shows up as INACTIVE in the AWS Console.

queries.name: query0
queries.query: find aws_ecs_task with active=true that !DEFINES aws_ecs_task_definition
